mapper.select: select ec.title, ec.cover, ec.lesson_num, ec.price, es1.title as es1title, es2.title as es2title, et.name from edu_course as ec left join edu_teacher as et on ec.teacher_id = et.id left join edu_subject as es1 on ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id left join edu_subject as es2 on ec.subject_id = es2.id where ec.id = #{courseId}

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.cover, CONVERT(c.price, DECIMAL(8,2)) AS price, c.lesson_num AS lessonNum, c.cover, c.buy_count AS buyCount, c.view_count AS viewCount, cd.description,
t.id AS teacherId, t.name AS teacherName, t.intro, t.avatar,
s1.id AS subjectLevelOneId, s1.title AS subjectLevelOne, s2.id AS subjectLevelTwoId, s2.title AS subjectLevelTwo
FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_course_description cd ON c.id = cd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s1 ON c.subject_parent_id = s1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s2 ON c.subject_id = s2.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
